name: 李旻璁
objective: 課程內容包含流體力學和動量傳遞，以及其在化工單元中的應用。本課程以中英文授課。所有專有名詞和課程教材都以課本原文(英文)呈現，講解和討論則以中文為主以利同學吸收。
schedule:
第六週(April 6)為假日，第九週(Apil 24&27)正常上課，第十八週(June 26)為期末考。

課程內容：
1. Introduction to momentum transfer
2. Fluid statics
3. Decription of a fluid in motion
4. Conservation of mass: control-volume approach
5. Newton's second law of motion: control-volume approach
6. Conservation of energy: control-volume approach
7. Shear stress in laminar flow
8. Analysis of a differential fluid element in laminar flow
9. Differential equation of fluid flow
10. Inviscid fluid flow
11. Dimensional analysis and similitude
12. Viscous flow
13. Flow in closed conduits
scorePolicy: 課程進行方式及評分標準於第一堂課說明。
materials:
課本，請務必購買：
[1] Fundamentals of Momentum, Heat and Mass Transfer, 6th edition, by Welty, Rorrer, and Foster.  |  歐亞書局 TEL: 02-8912-1188

其他參考書目：
[1] Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering, 7th Edition, by Warren L. McCabe, Julian C. Smith, and Peter Harriott
[2] Transport Phenomena, revised 2nd edition, by R. Byron Bird, Warren E. Stewart, and Edwin N. Lightfoot
[3] Analysis of Transport Phenomena, 2nd edition, by William M. Deen
